text: Love Cheatbits seafood bags! the ingredients are so fresh and definitely worth every penny! Before we left we tabao their big prawn cheese bee hoon for our parents. The prawns are really big and the sauce is not too cheesy too. Our parents love it! We will be back for more =)

ordered the large prawn vermicelli and the prawns ARE HUGE, value for money!
prawns are also fresh and sweet, meat is firm. vermicelli soaked up all the goodness and the flavours came together so well. highly recommended!

Ordered their seafood bag a couple of times prior to them opening a stall at ecp. Their crabs are always well cleaned. Hardly see any dirt or mud stains on the shell. Prawns and lala are fresh, sauces are üíØ esp the mantaiko mayo!

Tried their prawn vermicelli for the first time at their new stall and got addicted to it. Busting with flavours. You can customise the dish by adding more seafood or less/more pepper corns. They cooked the dish using thai garlic too. This has become my go-to vermicelli dish üòÑ

Best freshest seafood in bag.
I love their black pepper crab.
The vermicelli prawn is one of our favourite too! They also have fried mantou to go with ur chilli crab sauce...you need to try!!
2nd time here to have the big prawn Vermicelli. Standard still remain. Prawn is big and fresh. üëçüòã
